text: FC Epfendorf 1929 e.V. is a German sports club based in Epfendorf, Baden- Württemberg. The team currently plays in the Kreisliga A, the ninth tier of the German football league system. ==History== FC Epfendorf 1929 was officially founded on 2 May 1929 at the Gasthaus Engel in Epfendorf.
